Name: Syrtis Fusiliers
Details: Founded as the private army of House Hasek in 2468, the Syrtis Fusiliers serve as the guardians of the Hasek homeworld of New Syrtis, as well as defending the Capellan March of the Federated Suns. The Fusiliers are known for their loyalty to the Duke of New Syrtis, Michael Hasek-Davion.
